item.title: Boaz Weinstein 的 Saba 向英国投资信托股东提供全额现金退出方案
item.description: 美国对冲基金萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）周四表示，该公司将向英国先驱投资信托公司（Herald Investment Trust）的股东提供全额现金退出，退出价格为其资产净值的 99%，以争取股东批准对董事会进行彻底改革。【原文：U.S. hedge fund Saba Capital Management said on Thursday it would offer shareholders of UK's Herald Investment Trust a full cash exit at 99% of their net asset value, in a bid to win over the shareholders' approval for a board overhaul.】

item.title: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司第三季度利润同比下降 24
item.description: 日本 7-Eleven 连锁便利店运营商 Seven & i 控股公司周四公布的季度营业利润下降了 24%，低于分析师的预期。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings , operator of the 7-Eleven convenience store chain, reported on Thursday a drop of 24% in quarterly operating profit, missing analysts' estimates.】

item.title: 上海启动允许外资医院进入的计划
item.description: 上海已启动一项计划，允许在外籍人士聚居的重点经济区、生物医药区和市中心区设立外商独资医院。【原文：Shanghai has kicked off a plan to allow the establishment in China of wholly foreign-owned hospitals in key economic zones, biopharmaceutical areas and downtown districts that are home to many expatriate residents.】

item.title: 英国石油公司（BP）预计印度最大油田的石油产量将增加 44%，印度国家石油公司（ONGC）称
item.description: 据区块运营商石油和天然气公司周四称，根据一份长达十年的合同，全球能源巨头英国石油公司（BP）承诺将印度西海岸最大油田的石油产量提高 44%，天然气产量提高 89%。【原文：Global energy major BP has pledged to lift oil production by 44% and gas output by 89% from India's largest field off its west coast, under a decade-long contract, according to block operator Oil and Natural Gas Corp on Thursday.】

item.title: 优衣库运营商 Fast Retailing 称第一季度利润增长 7.4
item.description: 全球优衣库服装连锁店的日本运营商周四表示，第一季度营业利润增长了 7.4%，为其连续第四年实现创纪录利润的计划开了个好头。【原文：The Japanese operator of the global Uniqlo clothing chain said on Thursday that first-quarter operating profit rose 7.4%, a solid start to its plan to achieve record profits for a fourth-straight year.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁促使汽车供应商重新考虑生产计划
item.description: 在拉斯维加斯举行的消费电子展（CES）上，业内高管表示，全球汽车供应商正在研究有多少生产可以转移到美国或更靠近美国，以抵御当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺的关税。【原文：Global auto suppliers are working out how much of their production can be moved to the United States, or closer to it, as a defense against tariffs promised by President-elect Donald Trump, according to industry executives at CES in Las Vegas.】

item.title: 麦吉尔经纪公司为乌克兰提供财产战争再保险
item.description: 经纪商 McGill and Partners 已为乌克兰推出了一项商业财产战争风险再保险计划，该公司周四表示，这是自 2022 年 2 月俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来的首个此类计划。【原文：Broker McGill and Partners has launched a commercial property war risk reinsurance programme for Ukraine, which it said on Thursday was the first of its kind since Russia's invasion of the country in Feb 2022.】

item.title: 早间新闻英国处于债券市场风暴中心
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 联合利华在印尼的头疼问题因当地品牌的抵制而加剧
item.description: 联合利华和其他在以色列运营的跨国公司遭到抵制，这加剧了这家全球消费品公司在东南亚最大经济体印度尼西亚市场份额的流失，该公司正在与当地规模较小、价格往往更低的竞争对手展开激烈竞争。【原文：A boycott against Unilever and other multinationals operating in Israel has worsened the global consumer company's loss of market share in Indonesia, Southeast Asia's largest economy, where it is battling smaller, often cheaper local rivals.】

item.title: 外国人转为日本股票净卖家，锁定 2024 年收益
item.description: 截至 1 月 4 日的一周内，外国投资者净卖出日本股票，利用 2024 年的涨势，同时在异常漫长的市场休市期中降低风险。【原文：Foreign investors net sold Japanese stocks in the week ended Jan. 4, taking advantage of 2024 gains while aiming to reduce risks amid an unusually long market closure.】

item.title: 阿波罗地区高层表示将增加日本和亚洲财富的人员配置
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）的地区高管表示，随着全球投资公司向该地区投入更多资源，以抓住交易和资产激增的机遇，该公司计划扩大在日本的业务，并为其亚洲财富业务增加员工。【原文：Apollo Global Management plans to expand in Japan and add staff to its Asia wealth business, its regional top executive said, as global investment firms pump more resources into the region to capitalise on a surge in deals and assets.】

item.title: 9,500 万美元集体诉讼和解后，苹果澄清 Siri 隐私保护立场
item.description: 苹果公司周三澄清说，该公司从未出售其 Siri 语音助手收集的数据，也从未利用这些数据创建营销档案，而就在几天前，该公司刚刚与一起面临此类指控的案件达成和解。【原文：Apple clarified on Wednesday that it has never sold the data collected by its Siri voice assistant or used it to create marketing profiles, just days after settling a case in which it faced such accusations.】

item.title: 美元走强令英镑、欧元和日元持续承压
item.description: 受国债收益率上升的支撑，美元周四大幅走高，在关税威胁不断变化的背景下，日元、英镑和欧元在多个月低点附近承压。【原文：The U.S. dollar charged ahead on Thursday underpinned by rising Treasury yields, putting the yen, sterling and euro under pressure near multi-month lows amid the shifting threat of tariffs.】

item.title: 美国燃料库存增加，油价跌幅扩大
item.description: 受上周美国燃料库存大幅增加的打压，油价周四下跌，扩大了前一日的跌幅，但对欧佩克成员国和俄罗斯供应收紧的担忧抑制了油价的跌幅。【原文：Oil prices fell on Thursday, extending losses from the previous day, pressured by large builds in U.S. fuel inventories last week, though concerns over tighter supplies from OPEC members and Russia capped the decline.】

item.title: 需求疲软，中国消费通胀放缓
item.description: 12 月份，中国消费通胀放缓，导致 2024 年全年物价涨幅不大，而工厂通货紧缩则延续到第二年，原因是经济需求萎靡不振。【原文：China's consumer inflation slowed in December, leading to modest annual price gains for 2024 while factory-gate deflation extended into a second year, amid sputtering economic demand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚零售商 "黑色星期五 "受惠，但降息无障碍
item.description: 由于 "黑色星期五 "打折活动吸引了注重成本的购物者，澳大利亚 11 月份的零售额创下了 10 个月以来的最大增幅，但增幅低于预期，这表明零售额的增长并不妨碍降息。【原文：Australian retail sales had the biggest increase in 10 months in November as Black Friday discounting drew cost-conscious shoppers, but the rise missed forecasts suggesting the boost poses no impediment to rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚星空娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）因烧钱问题黯然失色，创下历史新低
item.description: 澳大利亚星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周四股价暴跌 25.6%，创下历史新低，该公司周三公布了赌场运营商 12 月季度的现金和流动资金状况后，其股价受到影响。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment saw its shares plummet as much as 25.6% during trade on Thursday to hit a record low, facing repercussions following its Wednesday announcement on the casino operator's concerning cash and liquidity position for the December quarter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚电信公司与马斯克的 SpaceX 公司合作，将卫星技术带回家
item.description: 澳大利亚顶级电信公司澳大利亚电信公司（Telstra）周四表示，它正在与亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司合作，为其地区客户提供卫星连接技术。【原文：Top Australian telco Telstra said on Thursday it is collaborating with billionaire Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring satellite connectivity technology to its regional customers.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：软银和 Arm 考虑收购 Ampere Computing
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，日本科技投资商软银集团公司及其控股的 Arm Holdings Plc 正在探讨收购由前英特尔高管领导的半导体公司 Ampere Computing。【原文：Japanese technology investor SoftBank Group Corp and its majority-owned Arm Holdings Plc are exploring a deal for Ampere Computing, a semiconductor firm headed by ex-Intel executives, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 现代汽车集团今年将在韩国投资创纪录的 167 亿美元
item.description: 韩国现代汽车集团（Hyundai Motor Group）周四表示，该公司计划将今年的国内投资额提高19%，达到24.3万亿韩元（约合166.5亿美元）的历史新高，以确保未来的增长，即使该公司正在努力应对经济和政治上的不确定性。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai Motor Group said on Thursday it planned to boost domestic investment by 19% to a record high of 24.3 trillion won ($16.65 billion) this year to secure future growth even as it grapples with economic and political uncertainties.】

item.title: 美国码头工人与港口雇主达成临时协议
item.description: 美国海运联盟（United States Maritime Alliance）周三表示，它与国际码头工人协会（International Longshoremen's Association）就一份为期 6 年的新总合同达成了临时协议。【原文：United States Maritime Alliance said on Wednesday it reached a tentative agreement on a new 6-year master contract with the International Longshoremen's Association.】

item.title: 花旗计划为特朗普就职典礼捐款，具体数额未透露
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，华尔街巨头花旗集团计划向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼基金捐献一笔尚未披露的款项，加入美国银行和高盛等主要贷款机构的行列。【原文：Wall Street giant Citigroup plans to contribute an as-yet undisclosed sum to President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration fund, according to a person familiar with the matter, joining fellow major lenders Bank of America and Goldman Sachs .】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司 2024 年交付 110 架 F-35 战斗机
item.description: 总部位于马里兰州贝塞斯达的防务承包商洛克希德-马丁公司周三在一份声明中说，该公司将在2024年向美国及其盟国交付总共110架F-35战斗机。【原文：Lockheed Martin delivered a total of 110 F-35 fighter jets to the United States and its allies in 2024, the Bethesda, Maryland-based defense contractor said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 沃尔沃首席执行官表示，尽管面临美国关税威胁，但墨西哥卡车工厂计划仍在进行中
item.description: 瑞典沃尔沃集团（Volvo Group）首席执行官马丁-伦德施泰特（Martin Lundstedt）周三告诉路透社记者，尽管美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对进口汽车和其他商品征收关税，但沃尔沃集团仍在继续推进其计划在墨西哥蒙特雷建造的价值 7 亿美元的重型卡车工厂。【原文：Sweden's Volvo Group is proceeding with its planned $700-million heavy-truck factory in Monterrey, Mexico, CEO Martin Lundstedt told Reuters on Wednesday, even as President-elect Donald Trump threatens to impose U.S. tariffs on imports of vehicles and other goods.】

item.title: 洛杉矶野火经济损失估计高达 500 亿美元
item.description: 美国私营预报机构 AccuWeather 周三表示，加州野火已经是历史上最严重的野火之一，初步估计造成的破坏和经济损失超过 500 亿美元。【原文：U.S. private forecaster AccuWeather said on Wednesday that estimated damage and economic loss from the California wildfire, already one of the worst in history, is over $50 billion at a preliminary level.】

item.title: 人工智能需求增长，Vanguard 集团增持 Talen Energy 股份至 10.4
item.description: 根据周三提交的一份文件，美国资产管理公司先锋集团（Vanguard Group）将其在独立电力生产商塔伦能源公司（Talen Energy Corp）的持股比例增至 10.4%。【原文：U.S. asset management firm Vanguard Group increased its stake in independent power producer Talen Energy Corp to 10.4%, according to a filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 股东敦促 UnitedHealth 分析医疗拒绝的影响
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）的股东们周三表示，他们要求该公司就其 "限制或延迟获得医疗服务的做法 "的相关成本和对公众健康的影响编写一份报告。【原文：UnitedHealth Group shareholders on Wednesday said they requested the company prepare a report on the costs and public health impact related to its "practices that limit or delay access to healthcare."】

item.title: 沃尔沃集团计划中的瑞典工厂将推迟电池厂生产
item.description: 沃尔沃集团首席执行官马丁-伦德施泰特（Martin Lundstedt）周三在拉斯维加斯消费电子展（CES）期间举行的路透社 NEXT 新闻人物活动上表示，沃尔沃集团预计计划中的瑞典电池厂的大批量生产将比原定目标（2029-2030 年）晚几年开始。【原文：Volvo Group expects high-volume production of a planned battery plant in Sweden to begin a couple of years later than the original target of 2029-2030, CEO Martin Lundstedt said at a Reuters NEXT Newsmaker event at CES in Las Vegas on Wednesday.】

item.title: 当地媒体称，巴西 Azul 航空公司正逐步接近与 Gol 航空公司合并
item.description: 据《Valor Economico》周三报道，巴西 Azul 航空公司预计将在未来几周内与竞争对手 Gol 航空公司的母公司 Abra 签署一份谅解备忘录，以促成 Azul 和 Gol 的潜在合并。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul is expected to sign in the next few weeks a memorandum of understandings with rival carrier Gol's parent Abra for a potential merger between Azul and Gol, newspaper Valor Economico reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拉扎德报告称，美国激进分子的要求推高了股价，但也许不会持续太久
item.description: 投资银行拉扎德（Lazard）的最新数据显示，在要求宣布后的几天内，这些企业的要求会带来相当可观的市场指数涨幅。【原文：Demands by U.S. activist investors can send a target company's stock surging, and new data from investment bank Lazard show that these corporate nudges generate considerable market index-beating gains in the days after demands are announced.】
